In the last few years, we have seen increased attacks on this safe and legal medical procedure. The extremely difficult and personal decision to have an abortion should rest with women and their doctors, not lawmakers. Period.

47 years ago, the #RoevWade decision affirmed that abortions are a safe & legal medical procedure. As the only woman doctor in Congress, I am committed to making sure that abortions remain legal and accessible for all women.

After nearly two decades at war, we can‚Äôt risk stumbling into another endless conflict that destabilizes the region and threatens the lives of American troops.

The repercussions of last night‚Äôs air strikes will play out in the coming days and weeks. Congress must be briefed on the imminent threat that prompted the air strikes, and the American public deserves to hear whether there is a coherent strategy in the region.

Qassim Soleimani was without question an enemy of the US, with American blood on his hands. Managing the multiple threats posed by Iran and its proxies requires diplomatic finesse, coordination with our allies, and an appreciation for unintended consequences.

It has been such an honor to serve the 8th District during my first year in office! Thank you to everyone who called, emailed, attended a town hall, or reached out to my office for assistance. https://t.co/OGm7ZPnPAO
